resources.string:
UN1CA is a free, community-driven project provided as is, without any guarantee of performance or compatibility.
By installing or using this software, you accept full responsibility for any potential damage, data loss, or malfunction. The UN1CA team is not liable for any issues caused directly or indirectly by its use.

Some apps may fail to function correctly due to device integrity checks (e.g. Play Integrity, hardware attestation, root detections).
It is the user’s responsibility to handle these cases by hiding detections or applying their own workarounds.
These problems are unrelated to the ROM and cannot be fixed by the maintainers.

UN1CA is and will always be completely free.
If you paid for this software or obtained it as part of a paid service or bundle, you have been scammed: please request your money back immediately.

For help, updates, and community discussions, don’t hesitate to reach us out through our official channels on GitHub or Telegram.
